bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ①All types of excreted or secreted turbid, unclear items, including pus and blood, feces and urine, vomitus, items discharged from one’s genital region, etc. Shang han lun 傷寒論 233: 大豬膽一枚，瀉汁，和少許法醋，以灌穀道內，如一食頃，當大 便出宿食惡物 , “Take a large pig’s gallbladder, pour the liquid out of it, fill in a small amount of vinegar and pour this into the anus. After the time it takes to have a meal, this will cause food remaining in the body over night and malign items to leave via defecation”.

②Unclean items that must be discarded during a pharmaceutical processing of substances to be used as pharmaceutical drug. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 19 Substance Entry mi jiao 麋角：曝乾 淨擇，去惡物、粗骨皮及鎊不勻者 , “Expose to the sun to dry them and select the clean parts. Remove malign items , coarse bone skin, and those parts that have not been evenly pounded”.
